name: surface-to-surface-3d-distance
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Compute distance between corresponding vertices.

Computes the vector difference between the vertices of each surface with the same index, as (comp - ref), and output the magnitudes, and optionally the displacement vectors.

inputs.name: surface_comp
inputs.description: the surface to compare to the reference

inputs.name: surface_ref
inputs.description: the surface to use as the reference

inputs.name: opt_vectors_vectors_out
inputs.description: output the displacement vectors: the output vectors

output-files.name: opt_vectors_vectors_out
output-files.description: output the displacement vectors: the output vectors
